biotools.summary: The Micropilot software from EMBL is a computer program that can rapidly learn what a scientist is looking for in an experiment and then take over the laborious and time-consuming task, automatically performing complex microscopy experiments when it detects cells with interesting features.

bioschemas.name: Micropilot
